casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Lawrence Allen SCHAFFER. No. 324P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Clark Everett, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 15th day of June 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Pitt County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th day of October 2006."
